憗字的基本解释

憗
yìn
古同“??”。

憗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yìn］
［《廣韻》魚覲切，去震，疑。］
亦作“慭1”。亦作“憗1”。
(1)宁肯；愿意。
(2)损伤；残灭。
(3)忧伤。
(4)闲。参见“憖暇”。
(5)戒慎。参见“憖憖”。
(6)喜悦。
(7)连词。且。表示递进关系。
[②]［xìn］
［《集韻》香靳切，去焮，曉。］
亦作“慭2”。亦作“憗2”。
笑貌；笑傲貌。
[③]［yín］
［《集韻》魚巾切，平真，疑。］
亦作“慭3”。
地名用字。

憗字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页402第22
【正字通】本作憖，俗省作憗。又作憗。

憗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憗字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrowful
Basic explanation of words
Sorrowful
yìn
Gu Tong "??".
Sorrowful
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yìn］
["Guangyun" fish cut, go to shock, doubt. ]
Also known as "慭1". Also known as "憗1".
(1) Would rather; be willing.
(2) Damage; mutilation.
(3) Sadness.
(4) Leisure. See "leisure".
(5) Caution. See "Xianxun".
(6) Joy.
(7) Conjunctions. And. Represents a progressive relationship.
[②]［xìn］
["Ji Yun" Xiang Jin Qi, Go Yan, Xiao. ]
Also known as "慭2". Also known as "憗2".
Smiling face; smiling arrogant face.
[③]［yín］
["Jiyun" fish towel cut, plain, suspicious. ]
Also known as "慭3".
Place names in words.
Sorrowful
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Character Department] 　憗; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 402 22
【Zhengzitong】This is for Xin, and the province is for Xin. Again.
